original_text: He gathered to himself the Ammonites and the Amalekites, and went and defeated Israel. And they took possession of the city of palms.
korean_text: 에글론이 암몬과 아말렉 자손들을 모아 가지고 와서 이스라엘을 쳐서 종려나무 성읍을 점령한지라

sentences.original_text: He gathered to himself the Ammonites and the Amalekites
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 암몬 사람과 아말렉 사람을 자기 편으로 모았다.

sentences.original_text: And they took possession of the city of palms.
